summary: Removes Requiem's spell options upon taking magic perks.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple patch for Requiem that removes the Spellchoices system whereby you can learn certain spells upon taking either the Novice, Apprentice, Adept Expert & Master perks in each magic school.

Why? I don't like the idea of receiving spells automatically for taking perks. If you use Spell Research and/or Better Spell Learning you might find this useful ... or not. Find those spells as loot, laying in some dank cave or buy them at the nearest stockist (assuming they are buyable). It simply removes the Spellchoices effect from the relevant perks. Also edits the descriptions to remove any reference to gaining spells from the perks. Compatible with 2.0 (and likely 1.9.4 if those perks haven't changed).

Optional Lite version that offers the spells for Novice level, but removes them from levels beyond that.

Requires: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]
author: Atardecer
